headline: GTA Online
subtitle: HVY Nightshark
content: There’s nothing quite like the sound of twin machine guns on a crisp morning to bring a smile to the face of even the most jaded gunrunner. But let’s face it, sometimes you want to unleash that hail of bullets in peace and comfort - and that’s where the HVY Nightshark comes in. Crowd-proof, bullet-proof, recession-proof, with front-facing machine guns as standard: this is the real business class.
